subject: CNN Alerts: bush
body:
CNN Alerts: bush






 



Alert Name: bush
Bush orders flags to half staff to mourn shooting victims

04/17/07 01:37 PM, EDT
Expressing the nation's sorrow, President Bush ordered flags flown at half staff Tuesday in honor of those killed in the nation's deadliest shooting spree.
FULL STORY
